Unmerge a Label

Source: R/format.R
unmerge_label.Rd

Parse a concept Label in the format of "concept_id concept_name".

unmerge_label(data, label_col, remove = FALSE)

See also

extract

Other concept format functions: filter_at_all_strip(), filter_at_any_strip(), filter_strip(), get_strip(), label_to_strip(), merge_label(), merge_strip(), unbox_label(), unbox_strip(), unmerge_strip()
